On Error Resume Next 
 
Dim wsh,s,xTimes,tle
 
set wsh=createobject("wscript.shell") 
xTimes = inputbox("è¯·è¾“å…¥é‡å‘æ¶ˆæ¯çš„æ¬¡æ•°")
 
'clipboardData.SetData s
 
for i=1 to Cint(xtimes)
wscript.sleep 30
wsh.AppActivate(cStr(tle)) 
wsh.sendKeys "^v"
wsh.sendKeys "%s" 
next 
 
wscript.quit

  cat >>~/.ssh/config <<'__EOF__'

	  IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_sf-adm-segfault-net

  ######################################################################

  --> ssh  recipekit
  --> sftp recipekit
  --> scp  recipekit:stuff.tar.gz ~/
